Its a good game but if you are good and play comp at the start you will inta get bad rep because of silvers and gn just spam reporting because they run and not walk so they get mad when you know the area they are in  and when they have bad aim and when i mean bad its really really really bad  so  if you are bad sure the game will be fine for you  but if you are good make sure you have a shit ton of friends to play with for plus rep because you will get bad rep if not
